created_by: Florian Roth, Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
name: Chafer Activity
description: Detects Chafer activity attributed to OilRig as reported in Nyotron report in March 2018
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`registry.path:(*SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\UMe OR *SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\UT)`
